# lolbat: Dracula-themed terminal colorizer

*2026-02-26T14:05:42Z by Showboat 0.6.1*
<!-- showboat-id: f457f02e-0b54-4c8a-988c-c2e404570100 -->

lolbat colorizes terminal output using the Dracula color palette. It reads from stdin or files and supports three coloring modes: sequential, sine, and random. Flags are compatible with lolcat.

## Install

```bash
go install github.com/jamesfishwick/lolbat@latest && echo 'installed'
```

```output
go: downloading github.com/jamesfishwick/lolbat v0.0.0-20260226140050-41611665f3ca
installed
```

## Flags

```
-mode string    Coloring mode: sequential, sine, random (default: sequential)
-freq float     Color wave frequency, sine mode only (default: 0.3)
-spread float   Characters per color step (default: 3)
-seed int       Starting palette offset (default: 0)
-a              Animate colors (loops until Ctrl-C)
```

## Sequential mode (default)

Each character advances through the Dracula palette. `-spread` controls how many characters share a color before stepping to the next.

```bash
printf "Painful zombies quickly watch a jinxed graveyard.\nThe quick onyx goblin jumps over the lazy dwarf.\nFive jumping wizards hex bolty quick.\nJinxed wizards pluck ivy from the big quilt.\nSphinx of black quartz, judge my vow.\n" | ~/go/bin/lolbat -spread 1.0
```

```output
[38;2;255;85;85mP[38;2;255;110;110ma[38;2;255;121;198mi[38;2;255;146;223mn[38;2;189;147;249mf[38;2;214;172;255mu[38;2;98;114;164ml[38;2;139;233;253m [38;2;164;255;255mz[38;2;80;250;123mo[38;2;105;255;148mm[38;2;241;250;140mb[38;2;255;255;165mi[38;2;255;85;85me[38;2;255;110;110ms[38;2;255;121;198m [38;2;255;146;223mq[38;2;189;147;249mu[38;2;214;172;255mi[38;2;98;114;164mc[38;2;139;233;253mk[38;2;164;255;255ml[38;2;80;250;123my[38;2;105;255;148m [38;2;241;250;140mw[38;2;255;255;165ma[38;2;255;85;85mt[38;2;255;110;110mc[38;2;255;121;198mh[38;2;255;146;223m [38;2;189;147;249ma[38;2;214;172;255m [38;2;98;114;164mj[38;2;139;233;253mi[38;2;164;255;255mn[38;2;80;250;123mx[38;2;105;255;148me[38;2;241;250;140md[38;2;255;255;165m [38;2;255;85;85mg[38;2;255;110;110mr[38;2;255;121;198ma[38;2;255;146;223mv[38;2;189;147;249me[38;2;214;172;255my[38;2;98;114;164ma[38;2;139;233;253mr[38;2;164;255;255md[38;2;80;250;123m.[0m
```

## Sine mode

The palette index oscillates along a sine wave. `-freq` controls wave frequency; `-spread` controls horizontal compression.

```bash
printf "Painful zombies quickly watch a jinxed graveyard.\nThe quick onyx goblin jumps over the lazy dwarf.\nFive jumping wizards hex bolty quick.\nJinxed wizards pluck ivy from the big quilt.\nSphinx of black quartz, judge my vow.\n" | ~/go/bin/lolbat -mode sine -freq 0.5 -spread 2.0
```

```output
[38;2;98;114;164mP[38;2;255;255;165ma[38;2;98;114;164mi[38;2;255;85;85mn[38;2;98;114;164mf[38;2;255;255;165mu[38;2;98;114;164ml[38;2;255;85;85m [38;2;98;114;164mz[38;2;255;255;165mo[38;2;98;114;164mm[38;2;255;85;85mb[38;2;98;114;164mi[38;2;255;255;165me[38;2;98;114;164ms[38;2;255;85;85m [38;2;98;114;164mq[38;2;255;255;165mu[38;2;98;114;164mi[38;2;255;85;85mc[38;2;98;114;164mk[38;2;255;255;165ml[38;2;98;114;164my[38;2;255;85;85m [38;2;98;114;164mw[38;2;255;255;165ma[38;2;98;114;164mt[38;2;255;85;85mc[38;2;98;114;164mh[38;2;255;255;165m [38;2;98;114;164ma[38;2;255;85;85m [38;2;98;114;164mj[38;2;255;255;165mi[38;2;98;114;164mn[38;2;255;85;85mx[38;2;98;114;164me[38;2;255;255;165md[38;2;98;114;164m [38;2;255;85;85mg[38;2;98;114;164mr[38;2;255;255;165ma[38;2;98;114;164mv[38;2;255;85;85me[38;2;98;114;164my[38;2;255;255;165ma[38;2;98;114;164mr[38;2;255;85;85md[38;2;98;114;164m.[0m
```

\![Sine mode: -mode sine -freq 0.5 -spread 2.0](demo-sine.svg)

## Random mode

Each line gets one color, chosen by a seeded PRNG keyed on `-seed + line number`. Output is fully deterministic.

```bash
printf "Painful zombies quickly watch a jinxed graveyard.\nThe quick onyx goblin jumps over the lazy dwarf.\nFive jumping wizards hex bolty quick.\nJinxed wizards pluck ivy from the big quilt.\nSphinx of black quartz, judge my vow.\n" | ~/go/bin/lolbat -mode random
```

```output
[38;2;255;121;198mPainful zombies quickly watch a jinxed graveyard.[0m
[38;2;105;255;148mThe quick onyx goblin jumps over the lazy dwarf.[0m
[38;2;164;255;255mFive jumping wizards hex bolty quick.[0m
[38;2;255;255;165mJinxed wizards pluck ivy from the big quilt.[0m
[38;2;255;85;85mSphinx of black quartz, judge my vow.[0m
```

\![Random mode: -mode random](demo-random.svg)

## Mode comparison

Same pangrams run through all three modes.

```bash
printf "Painful zombies quickly watch a jinxed graveyard.\nThe quick onyx goblin jumps over the lazy dwarf.\nFive jumping wizards hex bolty quick.\nJinxed wizards pluck ivy from the big quilt.\nSphinx of black quartz, judge my vow.\n" | ~/go/bin/lolbat -spread 2.0 && printf "\n" && printf "Painful zombies quickly watch a jinxed graveyard.\nThe quick onyx goblin jumps over the lazy dwarf.\nFive jumping wizards hex bolty quick.\nJinxed wizards pluck ivy from the big quilt.\nSphinx of black quartz, judge my vow.\n" | ~/go/bin/lolbat -mode sine -spread 2.0 && printf "\n" && printf "Painful zombies quickly watch a jinxed graveyard.\nThe quick onyx goblin jumps over the lazy dwarf.\nFive jumping wizards hex bolty quick.\nJinxed wizards pluck ivy from the big quilt.\nSphinx of black quartz, judge my vow.\n" | ~/go/bin/lolbat -mode random
```

## Spread comparison

`-spread 1` changes color every character. `-spread 3` (default) groups ~3 chars per color. `-spread 6` produces broader bands.

```bash
printf "Painful zombies quickly watch a jinxed graveyard.\nThe quick onyx goblin jumps over the lazy dwarf.\nFive jumping wizards hex bolty quick.\nJinxed wizards pluck ivy from the big quilt.\nSphinx of black quartz, judge my vow.\n" | ~/go/bin/lolbat -spread 1.0 && printf "\n" && printf "Painful zombies quickly watch a jinxed graveyard.\nThe quick onyx goblin jumps over the lazy dwarf.\nFive jumping wizards hex bolty quick.\nJinxed wizards pluck ivy from the big quilt.\nSphinx of black quartz, judge my vow.\n" | ~/go/bin/lolbat -spread 3.0 && printf "\n" && printf "Painful zombies quickly watch a jinxed graveyard.\nThe quick onyx goblin jumps over the lazy dwarf.\nFive jumping wizards hex bolty quick.\nJinxed wizards pluck ivy from the big quilt.\nSphinx of black quartz, judge my vow.\n" | ~/go/bin/lolbat -spread 6.0
```

## Seed variations

`-seed` shifts the starting position in the palette. Each value produces a different color entry point across the same text.

```bash
for s in 0 3 7 10; do printf "Painful zombies quickly watch a jinxed graveyard.\nThe quick onyx goblin jumps over the lazy dwarf.\nFive jumping wizards hex bolty quick.\nJinxed wizards pluck ivy from the big quilt.\nSphinx of black quartz, judge my vow.\n" | ~/go/bin/lolbat -seed $s -spread 2.0; printf "\n"; done
```

\![Seed variations: -seed 0 / 3 / 7 / 10](demo-seed.svg)

## Freq comparison (sine mode)

Higher `-freq` compresses the sine wave, cycling through the palette faster. Lower values produce longer, lazier gradients.

```bash
for f in 0.1 0.3 0.6 1.0; do printf "Painful zombies quickly watch a jinxed graveyard.\nThe quick onyx goblin jumps over the lazy dwarf.\nFive jumping wizards hex bolty quick.\nJinxed wizards pluck ivy from the big quilt.\nSphinx of black quartz, judge my vow.\n" | ~/go/bin/lolbat -mode sine -freq $f -spread 2.0; printf "\n"; done
```
